title: Italic pixel font from "Designer's Favourite Current Typefaces"
content:
I'm trying to find the italic pixel font. It was featured in [this book](http://web.archive.org/web/20110406165523/http:/createreject.com/unicef/), but the book doesn't name the typefaces.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [eboy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110406165523/http:/typophile.com/files/eboy.jpg) | 33.17 KB |
author: berge

comments.content: That's one of Eboy's own creations, [FF Screenstar](http://web.archive.org/web/20110406165523/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_screenstar/)
